divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my nextdoor neighbor's house and I was leaving and she called me back and I looked over another house and in the distance but not that far was a bright light. It was very bright and it was moving all over the sky. At first I thought it was a firework but then I saw it moving all over the place and at that point I knew it was a UFO. The ufo was very bright and was moving very fast and moved all over the sky. It then shot straight into the sky until I could not see it anymore. When I realized what it was I freaked with excitement and I ran home and just thought to myself about how lucky I was to be able to see such fenonima. Like I said the UFO shot straight up into the sky until it was out of sight.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Parkville
There were no other sightings in Parkville on or around July 19th 2004
Summary: bright light moving very fast moving in many directions and then shot into the sky until unseen.
